description: West Ham: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title: West Ham: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title_page: West Ham: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are West Ham in before the big kick-off on Saturday, 12 August?
If you send your questions, we will ask our BBC Radio London experts for their thoughts on all things Hammers.
